| History                 = The Ghost Boys are a Chinatown gang that was carrying out hits for the [[Celestial Order of the Hai-Dai (Earth-616)|Celestial Order of the Hai-Dai]]. They were using eggs, which upon hatching did the dirty work (bio-engineered [[Brood (Race)|Brood eggs]]
